alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 7:14PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN OSWEGO...FAR NORTHEAST WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue from near Wolcott east across Fair Haven to southern Oswego County. This band will remain nearly stationary through mid evening. Snowfall rates of around 2 inches per hour are expected in the most intense portion of this band. Travel conditions will be very poor, with very low visibility and deep snow cover on roads. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Central Square, Cato, Brewerton, Hastings, Volney, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo, Sterling, Phoenix, Ira, Wolcott, Minetto, Cleveland and Hannibal. This includes Interstate 81 near exit 32. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
